attributes.additional_details: Same company charging different prices depending on area and through put. Shell at Marus bridge £1.25. Shell in standish £1.31. Plus all the motorway services
attributes.background: Petrol stations should be regulated to stop them charging whatever they want

rejection.details:
Petitions need to call on the Government or Parliament to take a specific action.

We're not sure exactly what you'd like the Government or Parliament to do. 

You could start a new petition explaining clearly what you would like the Government or Parliament to do.
